name: Cats vs Cucumber
description:
Have fun pranking cute cats with cucumbers, but be careful and don't hurt them!

Throw cucumbers with accuracy to prank the little cats. The player have to shoot the cucumbers with the right power to put it in the best position to scare the little cat and make it jump like it gone nuts.

Increase your points making the cucumber bounce in the objects of the scenes, to make the cat fly even further, flying like a rocket!

No cats were harmed in the make of this game.
